reviews.review_msg: I'd be a hypocrite if i didn't write for Dale, as you can see, yes he is probably the best, im looking forward to taking more courses with him in the future, he is very kind and nice and if you're remotely interested in history then dale is your man, he shows you things in a wonderful perspective! and he is always available for help, anytime
Great teacher...very amusing...making boring material as interesting as possible and teaches outside the box

Holy crap this course was hard.  The average is typically C+/B-.  It's not a requirement to give A's.  Three hundred students, maybe 3-4 A's, at most.  Take it if you have excellent critical thinking and writing skills and you want a challenge to your gpa.
